title: Charles Is Crowned King in Ancient Ceremony With Modern Twists
description: The coronation, the first since Queen Elizabeth II’s in 1953, was a royal spectacle of the kind that only Britain still stages.

title: As king, Charles inherits untold riches, and passes control of his own vast holdings to William.
Queen Camilla Seems Lighter in Her New Role
description: The coronation was not just the moment Charles finally ascended to a role waited for his whole life, but also the final act in the long rehabilitation of the former Camilla Parker Bowles.

title: London Police Arrest Dozens of Protesters on Day of Coronation
description: Prior to the coronation, the police had said that there would be little tolerance for disruptive protests. On the day itself, more than 50 people were arrested, most on offenses that appeared to be connected to protests.

title: Jamaica Could Become a Republic in 2024. What Will That Look Like?
description: The Commonwealth country has scheduled a referendum in 2024 on whether to cut ties to the British monarchy, opening up a debate on how to reshape the society.

title: Judith Miller, ‘Antiques Roadshow’ Mainstay, Is Dead at 71
description: Known for her many guidebooks, she helped determine what was trash and what was treasure on the BBC series that inspired the American show.

title: Were William and Kate Late to the Coronation?
description: The Prince and Princess of Wales arrived at Westminster Abbey after King Charles III, prompting speculation among the many journalists covering the ceremony.

title: At the Coronation, Harry and William Find Themselves Rows Apart
description: The sons of King Charles III did not appear to interact during their father’s coronation.

title: Serbia Mourns and Reflects After Mass Shootings
description: Back-to-back massacres have forced the country, still in mourning, to grapple with its complicated and long gun tradition.

title: Dozens Killed in Ethnic Clashes in India’s Manipur State
description: Violence erupted over a question of who gets to claim special tribal status.

title: In Australia, He Was a ‘Great Father.’ Secretly, He Was an Escaped Convict.
description: New DNA evidence helped confirm that a man who went by John Damon and died in Australia in 2010 was actually William Leslie Arnold, a convicted killer and escaped inmate from Nebraska.

title: What Happened at King Charles’s Coronation: Key Moments
description: The lavish ceremony, Britain’s first in 70 years, was brimming with ancient traditions with a few modern touches.

title: Car Bombing Injures Russian Nationalist Prilepin, State Media Reports
description: Zakhar Prilepin, who fought in eastern Ukraine in support of a separatist rebellion, has long advocated an imperialist foreign policy by Moscow.

title: The Coronation of King Charles III, in Pictures
description: Britain is crowning King Charles III. Here’s a selection of the best photographs from the coronation weekend.

title: Ukraine Says It Shot Down Russia’s Most Sophisticated Missile for First Time
description: The Air Force said it intercepted the missile with a newly delivered U.S.-made Patriot air-defense battery, the first time Kyiv has said it used the advanced weapon.

title: Map: King Charles’s Coronation Procession Route
description: His route is markedly shorter than the one taken by Queen Elizabeth II in 1953.

title: Gordon Lightfoot’s Death Is a Loss That Feels Personal
description: Lightfoot’s music created the soundtrack for the daily life of many Canadian families.

title: Ukraine Faces Pressure Over Counteroffensive, as Putin Bides His Time
description: Ukraine is feeling short-term pressure from its Western backers for success in a looming counteroffensive. Vladimir Putin seems to be operating on a longer timeline.

title: It’s Coronation Day
description: Come for the crown jewels and gold stagecoach; stay for the questions about the monarchy’s relevance.

title: Canadians Greet King Charles’s Coronation With Muted Response
description: The king’s representative in Canada, where he is head of state, recently appealed to people in the country to “give him a chance.”

title: Coronation Live Updates: U.K. Will Crown King Charles III Today
description: The country’s first new monarch in seven decades will be crowned in a ceremony that dates back a millennium, with pomp that some respect as tradition and others see as out of place in modern life.

title: Share Your Thoughts on the Crowning of King Charles III
description: The New York Times invites readers to share their comments and observations about the coronation of Britain’s King Charles III.

title: For Anti-Monarchists, Charles’s Coronation Is Evidence for Ending the Monarchy
description: Supporters of an elected head of state for Britain see the coronation as an opportunity to highlight the absurdity of having a royal family in the 21st century.

title: King Charles’s Coronation: What Will Happen and When
description: Processions through central London will bookend a coronation service in Westminster Abbey. King Charles III and other members of the royal family will also make an appearance on the balcony of Buckingham Palace.

title: More than 13,000 Evacuated as Wildfires Burn in Western Canada
description: More than 100 wildfires were burning across Alberta on Friday night. Conditions conducive to fires were also expected in the U.S. Southwest over the weekend.

title: Your Coronation Briefing
description: A special edition on King Charles III.
